definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon

sentences.english: The heavy rare earth and Y also belong to immobile elements.
sentences.chinese: 重稀土元素及Y也属于不活泼元素。

sentences.english: Yet it didn’t pledge to underpin all rare earth prices.
sentences.chinese: 但该公司并没有承诺支撑所有稀土元素的价格。

sentences.english: The improvement factors for creep fracture strength were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了稀土元素改善耐热钢热强性的因素。

sentences.english: Alloying functions of rare earth metals (REM) in iron and steels are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了稀土元素在铁和钢中的合金化作用。

sentences.english: The non-spectral interference effect of Al on REE' was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了铝对稀土元素的非光谱干扰。

sentences.english: The phenomenon of up-conversion is the peculiar property of rare earth ions.
sentences.chinese: 上转换现象是稀土元素激光材料具有的特性。

sentences.english: The rare-earth the Department of Energy seems particularly paranoid about is neodymium.
sentences.chinese: 动力部特别瞧重的稀土元素似乎是钕。

sentences.english: It is the first time attainable rare earth elements were confirmed on the seafloor.
sentences.chinese: 这是海底可利用的稀土元素资源量首次得到确认。

sentences.english: The contents of 8 rare earth elements(REEs)in chloroplasts of Brassia napus were determined by instrumental neutron activation analysis.
sentences.chinese: 用中子活化分析测定了油菜叶绿体中的稀土元素含量。

sentences.english: The content of rare-earth elements in the Dongfengshan iron-bearing formation gold deposit is generally lower.
sentences.chinese: 东风山含铁建造金矿床中稀土元素含量普遍较低。

sentences.english: Determination of rare earth elements Cerium, Europium, Yttrium with DBC-chlorophosphonazo by solid phase spectrophotometry;
sentences.chinese: 偶氮氯膦固相光度法测定稀土元素铈，铕，钇。

sentences.english: It suggests that rare-earth elements yttrium and praseodymium have certain genotoxicity.
sentences.chinese: 提示稀土元素钇和镨具有一定的遗传毒性。

sentences.english: The REE patterns are the magmatic hydrothermal characteristics in Sumugou Cu-Pb-Zn deposit.
sentences.chinese: 苏木沟铜铅锌矿点具有岩浆热液稀土元素特征。

sentences.english: The reason that rare earths elements increases the heat-plasticity of chrome allo…
sentences.chinese: 初步探讨了稀土元素提高铬合金铸铁热塑性的机理。

sentences.english: The chondrite-normalized REE patterns exhibit a gently right-dipping V-type curve with a severe depletion in Eu.
sentences.chinese: 稀土元素模式曲线具缓右倾“V”字形，铕亏损强烈。

sentences.english: The influence of rare earth element on the properties of sintered copper molybdenum steel has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了稀土元素对烧结铜钼钢性能的影响。

definition: lanthanoid (rare earth series), namely: lanthanum La57 鑭|镧[lan2], cerium Ce58 鈰|铈[shi4], praseodymium Pr59 鐠|镨[pu3], neodymium Nd60 釹|钕[nu:3], promethium Pm61 鉕|钷[po3], samarium Sm62 釤|钐[shan1], europium Eu63 銪|铕[you3], gadolinium Gd64 釓|钆[ga2], terbium Tb65 鋱|铽[te4], dysprosium Dy66 鏑|镝[di1], holmium Ho67 鈥|钬[huo3], erbium Er68 鉺|铒[er3], thulium Tm69 銩|铥[diu1], ytterbium Yb70 鐿|镱[yi4], lutetium Lu71 鑥|镥[lu3]
